mapper.select: SELECT /* tis.biz.xx.mapper.XX1010Mapper.selectList */ STDR_DATE AS stdrDate /* 기준일자 */ , SALS_DD_YN AS salsDdYn /* 영업일여부 */ , INT_RT AS intRt3 /* 이자율 */ , INT_RT AS intRt3 /* 이자율 */ , INT_RT AS intRt2 /* 이자율 */ , TRAN_AMT AS tranAmt /* 거래금액 */ FROM TB_XX002M /* 일자기본 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND STDR_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{stdrYm},'__') /* 기준일자 - 기준년월 */ AND STDR_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{stdrYm3},'__') /* 기준일자 - 기준년월 */ ORDER BY STDR_DATE
